members.description: Ting Global Cultural Ambassador and Community-Led Developer specializing in Localizing Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

members.description: Social activist in the field of employment of people with disabilities. Member of the Accessibility Committee of the Kfar-Saba Municipality.

members.name: Kate Breeze-Raz
members.description: Digital designer, creating graphics and using digital art to enhance Challenge 18 and making it fun for everyone to play and enjoy!

members.description: Full-stack web developer, specializing in planning and building modern websites and web applications, with advanced designs and optimized user experience.

members.description: Game developer, programming in C# in Unity and Blueprint in Unreal Engine. Developing modern games for all platforms both online and offline while maintaining high quality code documentation.

members.description: Applications and Games Programmer, Using Unity.sys to improve the world a bit by bit. Specializing in networking and solving problems with simple SOLID solutions.

members.description: Program Developer and Game Designer, designing applications and games on multiple platforms, specializing in Player and User experience.

members.name: Prof. Shai Dekel
members.description: Visiting associate professor at the school of mathematics, Tel-Aviv University. He also serves as a principal scientist in GE Global Research and as Angel Investor in TLVseed and as a member of Akban.

members.name: Dr. Dafna Gan
members.description: Co-founder and the director of The Center for Environmental and Sustainability Education, head of the environmental education Master’s program in the Department of Sciences at Kibbutzim College of Education and the Arts.

members.name: Marcelo Sternberg
members.description: Professor, Ecology, School of Plant Sciences & Food Security, Tel Aviv University.

members.name: Adi Shmorak
members.description: Product executive and strategist, guiding entrepreneurs on their journey to Product/Market Fit. Works with multiple impact organizations, set to improve our world through education.

members.name: Guy Salomon
members.description: Co-founder and CEO of GOOL, an Israeli education wesbite.

members.name: Johnny Chong
members.description: Founding Chairman of STARS Foundation since 2005.  Trained as an engineer with strong business architect and development professional to organize resources logically, effectively and being involved in start-ups business model development, technology transfer M&A and IPO consultancy since year 2015.

members.name: David Hanson Jr.
members.description: American roboticist who is the founder and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Hanson Robotics, a Hong Kong-based robotics company founded in 2013.

members.name: Lawrence Yee
members.description: Co-President (2017-), President (2015-16), Board Director and founder of Cradle Program of AAMA-PRD chapter since 2015.  He also sits on the board of BIIA (Business Information Industry Association) since its inception in 2006.

members.name: Newton Lee
members.description: Computer scientist who is an author and administrator in the field of education and technology commercialization. He is known for his total information awareness book series.

members.name: Tom Ross
members.description: Director of Sentient Rights Advocacy for the United States Transhumanist Party.

members.description: After gaining experience in the fields of innovation facilitation and commercialisation of businesses, backed by LL.M. from Tel Aviv University in Technology Law, Skaistė has formed an unsurpassing set of multidisciplinary skills as a forward-thinking entrepreneur.
